general_advisory: Complete transplanting of winter vegetable crops. Use low-cost polythene cover above the vegetables nursery to avoid poor germination due to low temperature. For early and maximum yield in cole crops, spray gibberellic acid 0.001% L. Do proper field surveillance for pests and diseases regularly.

advisory: Post-harvesting stage: Rodent/Rats problem - Locate rodent burrow, place aluminium phosphide tablet. Stored grain insect pest - Fumigation with Aluminium phosphide tablets.
Vegetative stage: Tobacco caterpillar - Monitor and spray insecticides as needed.
Vegetative stage: Aphids and Thrips - Use neem-based pesticide or chemical sprays.
Vegetative stage: Diamond Back Moth infestation - Use neem-based pesticide or spray insecticides.
Planting: Choose appropriate varieties, maintain proper spacing, and use disease-free suckers.
Make necessary arrangements for heat provision, proper brooding, and clean house maintenance for chicks.
